Within 28 day completion induction therapy , patient respond stable disease receive paclitaxel IV 60 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 , 29 , 36 , 43 radiotherapy daily , 5 time weekly , 7 week begin day 1 . Within 6-8 week completion therapy , patient initially bulky neck disease ( N3 ) residual palpable lymphadenopathy undergo surgical neck dissection . Patients N1-N2 disease complete response may also undergo neck dissection . Patients initial complete response recur primary site undergo surgical salvage .
